# SoraWebsocketServer constructor

创建一个反向WS服务端

```csharp
public SoraWebsocketServer(ServerConfig config, Action<Exception> crashAction = null)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| config | 服务器配置 |
| crashAction | 发生未处理异常时的回调 |

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| ArgumentNullException | 读取到了空配置文件 |
| ArgumentOutOfRangeException | 服务器启动参数错误 |
